title: Artificial intelligence is creating a new colonial world order
contents: An MIT Technology Review series investigates how AI is enriching a powerful few by dispossessing communities that have been dispossessed before.

title: How connectivity goes hand in hand with business growth
contents: Automation, AI, data and analytics are vital components of a transformation. These digital solutions, along with new ways of working, truly enable transformational capabilities and unlock long-term value.

title: How companies are investing in data and analytics
contents: Investments have paralleled advancements in AI coupled with analytics. The pandemic pushed forward certain AI use cases like conversational agents. However, there still is a gap in organizational trust and measuring ROI from AI initiatives.

title: Increase your limits: how to capture value from the industry cloud
contents: Fully digitalized cloud solutions arent just improving cost-effectiveness while integrating workflows across the organization in real time; they are also lowering the barriers to entry in many markets and shifting the competitive landscape.

title: How building your tech ecosystem fuels innovation and growth opportunities
contents: Ecosystem development requires thoughtful planning and careful integration but offers the opportunity to deliver wide-ranging benefits.

title: How digital transformation is driving a shift in talent and culture
contents: As with the myriad other challenges IT organizations face, seeding and cultivating a mix of technical and business-savvy talent will be a key differentiator that could define an organization’s ability to compete successfully in the digital era.

title: Effective risk management is not risk avoidance
contents: People have a strange relationship with risk. Most of us prefer to avoid it – consistently choosing a sure outcome over a gamble with equal or higher expected value. Yet success in nearly everything involves taking risk.
